body: @greenLandBall Anime=Fiction≠logic depends on the writer for the plot.

Very weird story, the Japanese really are weird but I applaud them for being so creative at writing this, seriously these 2 could have been paid heroes, would have been smarter if you think of it and that other person was a villain so she could have just steal money from the bank to make money, I sometimes dont get the logic in these doujins but I guess that's just how Japanese people are
